contents: Article 18 (Registration Classification) ① Member sports organizations shall be divided into divisions based on purpose, age, etc. At this time, players under the age of 15 are registered as a department for training purposes, and players over the age of 16 are registered as a department for either professional sports purposes or recreational sports purposes. Revised on May 4, 2023. Purpose of training A. Under 12 years old B. Under 15 years old 2. Professional sports purpose a. Under 18 years old B. It is a university department. General Department 3. Purpose of daily sports A. Under 18 years old B. It is a university department. General Department ② A separate department may be established according to the characteristics of the member sports organization within the range of not exceeding the age specified in each subparagraph of Paragraph 1. Revised January 24, 2022. ③ Students enrolled in schools falling under subparagraphs 1 to 6 of Article 2 of the Higher Education Act are enrolled in the university department. However, in the case of athletes over 19 years of age who register for recreational sports purposes, they can register as a general division for recreational sports purposes depending on their organization, even if they are enrolled in college. Revised May 4, 2023 ④ In the general division, players aged 19 or older who are not college students register. Revised May 4, 2023
